title: ANZ predicts Australia cash rate at 0.25% by May 2020
text:
ANZ predicts Australia cash rate at 0.25% by May 2020

Economy 2 hours ago (Sep 05, 2019 14:30)

© Reuters. ANZ predicts Australia cash rate at 0.25% by May 2020 SYDNEY, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Economists at ANZ Banking Group said on Thursday they expect Australia's central bank to sharply cut its cash rate to as low as 0.25% by May 2020, from their previous prediction of just one more easing to 0.75%. The other three major Australian banks - Westpac , National Australia Bank and Commonwealth Bank - see the cash rate at 0.5-0.75% by end-2020. The Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) has chopped its benchmark rate twice this year to a record low of 1% and has said it will move again if needed.

ANZ predicts Australia cash rate at 0.25% by May 2020
description: ANZ predicts Australia cash rate at 0.25% by May 2020
